action_adventure_shounen.additional_info: | "Aesop" no Ohanashi yori: Ushi to Kaeru, Yokubatta Inu
| "Anata o Hitokoto de Arawashite Kudasai" no Shitsumon ga Nigate da.
| "Hataraku Saibou!!" Saikyou no Teki, Futatabi. Karada no Naka wa "Chou" Oosawagi!
| "Omae Gotoki ga Maou ni Kateru to Omou na" to Yuusha Party o Tsuihou Sareta node, Outo de Kimama ni Kurashitai
